casebody.data:
ROSS ENGINEERING COMPANY, INC., A CORPORATION, v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45198] [103 C. Cls. 185;

326 U. S. —]

Government contract; misrepresentation; contractor’s knowledge of conditions. Petition dismissed.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 8, 1945.
